caption.title: Additional file 2: Figure S2
caption.p: sRNAs associate with the retrotransposon class, LTR/Gypsy. Size distribution of representative loci from the major retrotransposon classes LTR/Gypsy in mycelial libraries (A); One representative locus of GYMAG1_I-int LTR/Gypsy on chromosome 6 under wild type (complete media) conditions (B); abundance of 16 different LTR/Gypsy retrotransposons on sense (open box) and antisense (filled box) strands of all mycelial libraries (C); abundance of sRNAs from LTR/Gypsy classes under different stresses in the mycelial libraries (D). (CM = complete media; CS = carbon starved; MM = minimal media; NS = nitrogen starved; PQ = paraquat).
